name: Ada Lovelace
info: English mathematician regarded as the first computer programmer.

name: Grace Hopper
info: A pioneer of computer programming who invented one of the first compiler related tools.

name: Lise Meitner
info: One of the first scientists to discover nuclear fission.

name: Tu Youyou
info: Discovered artemisinin, one of the most effective antimalarial drugs which saved millions of lives.

name: Chien-shiung Wu
info: The `First Lady of Physics` who made significant contributions to nuclear physics.

name: Mae Jemison
info: The first African-American woman in space.

name: Jennifer Doudna
info: Biochemist and leading figure in CRISPR genome editing.

name: Gertrude Elion
info: Biochemist and pharmacologist who invented many drugs to treat major diseases, including AIDS.

name: Vera Rubin
info: Astronomer who pionered work on galaxy rotation rates and discovered evidence for the existence of dark matter.

name: Barbara McClintock
info: Cytogeneticist. The only woman to receive an unshared Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine for her discovery of genetic transposition.

name: Ida Noddack
info: Chemist and physicist. Discovered element 75, rhenium. Nominated three times for the Nobel Prize in Chemistry.

name: Jane Goodall
info: Primatologist and top expert on chimpanzees.
